name: Password Manger Web App
desc: A React password manager for saving, editing, and copying passwords, with UUID, React Toastify, and local storage.

name: To-Do Web App
desc: A responsive task management app built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, using React Hooks for state management and GitHub for version control.

name: Weather Web App
desc: A weather app that fetches real-time data using the Fetch API and OpenWeatherMap API, built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

name: Quiz Web App
desc: A 20-question web development quiz with a (Show Answers) button to review responses.

name: E-commerce website (Order My Book)
desc: A responsive e-commerce site for browsing and purchasing books online, built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.

name: Amazon Clone
desc: An e-commerce site using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap for a mobile-friendly, interactive experience.
